attributes.action: Amend the Civil Partnership Act 2004 to allow faith groups to perform civil partnerships within their religous buildings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently civil partnerships are not permissible in religous buildings or buildings used primarily for religous purposes. Some faith groups are open to civil partnerships but are unable to perform legal partnership ceremonies under the current restrictions. This provides the churches the freedom to decide for themselves.
